full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 757 Filed 08/10/22 Page 46 of 49 LC9VMAXT
1 (Witness excused)
2 MS. MODE: Your Honor, could I have just a moment to confer with the defense?
3 THE COURT: You may.
4 (Counsel conferred)
5 THE COURT: Members of the jury, you may put the folder back under your seats.
6 MS. COMEY: Your Honor with the defense's consent, we'd ask to be heard in the robing room please.
7 THE COURT: Okay. You anticipate an extended sidebar?
8 MS. COMEY: We just need to be in the robing room, your Honor.
9 THE COURT: Okay. Why don't I send the jury back to the jury room for a break and then --
10 MS. MODE: Thank you, your Honor.
11 THE COURT: Yes, to the regular room.
12 (Jury not present)
13 THE COURT: All right. I'll hear you in the robing room. This is an extended discussion;
14 MS. MODE: I'm not sure, your Honor, but our joint preference would be to be heard in the robing room.
15 THE COURT: Okay. All right.
16 (Pages 2020 to 2024 SEALED)
17 (Continued on next page)
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00013587
